title: Mediterranean Glamour in the Greek Islands
description: Uncover the secrets of the locals' favourite Greek island of Andros at the Aegea Blue Cycladic Resort. Nestled on a hilltop, this exclusive property offers spectacular views over the Aegean Sea. Includes daily buffet breakfast, nightly three-course Mediterranean dinners, a three-course ‘Flavours of Greece’ lunch and welcome drinks.

title: Serene Greek Island Getaway on Andros Island with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Welcome Cocktails
description:
Reach new levels of relaxation at Aegea Blue Cycladic Resort, a secluded haven on Andros Island. Tucked into the hillside above picturesque Zorgos Beach, this peaceful escape offers all the modern comforts, housed in locally inspired Cycladic architecture. Enjoy sweeping views of the Aegean Sea, spend afternoons lounging by the infinity pool or unwind on your private balcony. Sample the fresh flavours of the Mediterranean at the onsite restaurant which boasts a daily rotating menu of local produce and traditional recipes.

Easily accessible trails take you to the river basin of Aphrodite's Baths - perfect for bird-watching and eel-fishing - and the captivating nearby village of deserted water mills. Ancient ruins and hidden sea caves are just a short boat trip away.
